name: Forgotten Dreams (NesdomaniaGames)
description:
FORGOTTEN DREAMS

Description:

This is a short 10-20 minute story game where you wake up in a strange dream like world. In order to escape you must remember yourself and all of the important things that have slipped away from you because of the busyness of every day life.

Gameplay:

You will walk around searching for 5 "memories", once all 5 are collected you can escape through a portal guarded by monsters meant to keep forgotten things lost.

Developer Note:

This is my first story based game, please enjoy and let me know if you'd like to see more games like this from me in the future.

Windows Only - If this does well, we may add Mac support.
